title: Tic Tac Toe Application
description: This is a ReactJS built application that is a 'Tic Tac Toe' game. You can play it with a friend or by yourself. Please click below to view the live version or the github repository of the application.

title: Pokemon Terminal Game
description: This is a game built using NodeJS, to start cd into 'pokemon-game' in your terminal and enter 'node script.js' to begin. You can create a trainer account and select a pokemon. Please click below to view the live version or the github repository of the application.

title: Voice Number Guessing Game
description: This is a number guessing game created using ReactJS. You vocally enter a number and it will tell you whether that number is correct or if it is higher/lower. Please click below to view the live version or the github repository of the application.

title: Animated Navigation Bar Application
description: This is an animated navigation bar that when you click it creates navigation menu to pop up on the right side of the application as the hamburger menu lines change. Please click below to view the live version or the github repository of the application.

title: React To Do List
description: This is a simple to do list created using ReactJS. Type in a job, objective or goal and press 'enter' and it will create a bulleted list of objectives you entered. Please click below to view the live version or the github repository of the application.

title: Github Cards Application
description: This application was created with ReactJS and allows you to type in any Github username and add there card username to the application. Please click below to view the live version or the github repository of the application.
